name: ZERO G (Rather_Smashing)
description:
Game was made over the course of a couple of weekends for the June 2021 "One Game A Month #2" Jam.

The game is a simple bullet hell style space shooter with a vaguely retro aesthetic. Earn points by surviving and for each enemy ship destroyed. The game also incorporates a wide variety of projectiles and enemies to encounter.

Post your scores in the comments and enjoy the game! :)

Good luck :)

Credits

Programming & Art by me
